item.title: Overview
item.description: Overview: Prabhat was established in 1930 and ever since then; the organization has been involved in serving and contributing to society through its offerings. Prabhat is known for, World class dance musicals Prabhat Auditoriums Prabhat Sound Studio Prabhat Institute for learning Prabhat Costumes Prabhat Lighting and Sound System Prabhath Event Managers
